languages.text: "Первое время я был не в себе, но стиснул зубы и стал читать катехизисы Лекс Империалис — с самого начала, как если бы вновь оказался в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Схола Прогениум{/g}. Каждый раз, чувствуя, что снова сорвусь, я запирался в каюте и перечислял положения Инъюнкта Кардинал, и это помогло".

"I wasn't myself for a while, but I gritted my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."
languages.original_text: "Первое время я был не в себе, но стиснул зубы и стал читать катехизисы Лекс Империалис — с самого начала, как если бы вновь оказался в {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Схола Прогениум{/g}. Каждый раз, чувствуя, что снова сорвусь, я запирался в каюте и перечислял положения Инъюнкта Кардинал, и это помогло".

traits.locale_text: "I wasn't myself for a while, but I grit my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the Schola. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin, codex in hand, and it helped."

Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."

"I wasn't myself for a while, but I gritted my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."

languages.text:
「しばらくの間、自分を見失っていました。
だが歯を食いしばって、レックス・インペリアの教義を最初から読み直し始めたんです。まるで{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}帝国教導院{/g}に戻ったかのように。心が折れそうになるたびに、船室にこもって、インユンクタ・カーディナルを暗唱しました。それが、支えとなったのです」
languages.original_text: "I wasn't myself for a while, but I gritted my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."

traits.locale_text:
「しばらくの間、自分を見失っていました。
だが歯を食いしばって、レックス・インペリアの教義を最初から読み直し始めたんです。まるで帝国教導院に戻ったかのように。心が折れそうになるたびに、法典を手にして船室にこもりました。それが、支えとなったのです」

languages.text: "Ich war eine Weile nicht ich selbst, aber ich habe die Zähne zusammengebissen und begonnen, den Katechismus des Lex Imperia von Anfang an zu lesen, als wäre ich zurück in der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Immer wenn ich das Gefühl hatte, wieder zusammenzubrechen, habe ich mich in meiner Kabine eingesperrt und die Injuncta Cardinal rezitiert. Und das hat geholfen."
languages.original_text: "I wasn't myself for a while, but I gritted my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war eine Weile nicht ich selbst, aber ich habe die Zähne zusammengebissen und begonnen, den Katechismus des Lex Imperia von Anfang an zu lesen, als wäre ich zurück in der {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Immer wenn ich das Gefühl hatte, wieder zusammenzubrechen, habe ich mich in meiner Kabine eingesperrt und die Injuncta Cardinal rezitiert. Und das hat geholfen."

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas été moi-même durant un certain temps, mais j'ai serré les dents et j'ai entrepris de relire intégralement la Lex Imperialis, comme si j'étais de nouveau élève de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Chaque fois que je me sentais perdre pied, je m'enfermais dans ma cabine et je récitais l'Injuncta Cardinal. Ces efforts ont porté leurs fruits. »
languages.original_text: "I wasn't myself for a while, but I gritted my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas été moi-même durant un certain temps, mais j'ai serré les dents et j'ai entrepris de relire intégralement la Lex Imperialis, comme si j'étais de nouveau élève de la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Chaque fois que je me sentais perdre pied, je m'enfermais dans ma cabine et je récitais l'Injuncta Cardinal. Ces efforts ont porté leurs fruits. »

languages.text: «Estuve fuera de mí durante una temporada, pero hice de tripas corazón y me puse a leer el catecismo de la Lex Imperialis desde el principio, como si estuviese otra vez en la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Cada vez que sentía que me venía abajo, me encerraba en mi camarote y recitaba la Injuncta Cadardinal. Y ayudaba».
languages.original_text: "I wasn't myself for a while, but I gritted my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."

traits.locale_text: «Estuve fuera de mí durante una temporada, pero hice de tripas corazón y me puse a leer el catecismo de la Lex Imperialis desde el principio, como si estuviese otra vez en la {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Cada vez que sentía que me venía abajo, me encerraba en mi camarote y recitaba la Injuncta Cadardinal. Y ayudaba».

languages.text: “是啊，有段时间，我感觉失去了自我。然而，当我咬紧牙关，重新从头开始阅读帝国法典的教义时，我感觉自己仿佛再次回到了{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}忠嗣学院{/g}。每当我感到自己又要崩溃的时候，我就会把自己锁在船舱里，大声朗诵《红衣主教训谕》，就这么撑下来了。”
languages.original_text: "I wasn't myself for a while, but I gritted my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，有段时间，我感觉失去了自我。然而，当我咬紧牙关，重新从头开始阅读帝国法典的教义时，我感觉自己仿佛再次回到了{g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}忠嗣学院{/g}。每当我感到自己又要崩溃的时候，我就会把自己锁在船舱里，大声朗诵《红衣主教训谕》，就这么撑下来了。”

languages.text: "Bir süredir kendimde değildim ama dişimi sıkıp sanki tekrar {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}'daymışım gibi Lex İmperialis'in ilmihâllerini baştan başlayarak okumaya başladım. Tekrar çökecek gibi hissettiğimde kendimi kamarama kilitledim, cildi elimden hiç bırakmadım. İşe de yaradı."
languages.original_text: "I wasn't myself for a while, but I gritted my teeth and started reading the catechisms of the Lex Imperialis from the very beginning, as if I were back in the {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium{/g}. Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."

traits.locale_text: "Bir süredir kendimde değildim ama dişimi sıkıp sanki tekrar {g|Encyclopedia:ScholaProgeniumGlossary}Schola Progenium'daymışım{/g} gibi Lex İmperialis'in ilmihâllerini baştan başlayarak okumaya başladım. Tekrar çökecek gibi hissettiğimde kendimi kamarama kilitledim, cildi elimden hiç bırakmadım. İşe de yaradı."

Whenever I felt like I might break down again, I locked myself in my cabin and recited the Injuncta Cardinal. And it helped."
